alert.note: Alert for Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:56PM CDT until May 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TIPPAH AND CENTRAL BENTON COUNTIES... At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gravestown, or 12 miles northwest of Ripley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Snow Lake Shores, Gravestown, Walnut, Ashland, Falkner, Murry, Brody, Spring Hill, Whitten Town, Pine Grove, Hamilton and Bethel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
